subtitle: Although the soft fruit season is very short, redcurrants freeze well for up to a year - so this recipe may be made all year round.

method.text: Crush biscuits into crumbs. Grease a 23 cm loose-bottomed flan dishP ress the biscuits into this.
Separate eggs. Beat yolks with sugar until thick and creamy.
Heat coffee with the cocoa powder. Dissolve the gelatine in this and pour onto beaten yolks. Then blend well with the soft cheese. Chill.
Fold in stiffly beaten egg whites. Spoon onto biscuits and leave to set.
Sprinkle with icing sugar and top with redcurrants.
Melt redcurrant jelly with water. Brush over the fruit and leave until glaze sets.

title: Redcurrant cheesecake
